title: Technical
items: leave code in a better shape than before
maintain code quality and monitor build failures

title: Leadership
items: writing modular, well-tested and maintainable code
proposing new ideas, performing feasability analysis and scoping the work
leading complex features and bug fixes with architectural perspective
improving the teams's tooling and process to make it more effective

title: Communication
items: feedback for peers, in a positive way and always by being specific and giving ways to improve
issues/tickets by keeping them up-to-date and well-documented
